ygData.subject: Making money
ygData.msgSnippet: I don t know what level you are, but I ve made up to 100pp an hour in Rathe grouped and doing alpha loot... The most I ve looted off a HG at one time is 41pp,
ygData.messageBody:
I don't know what level you are, but I've made up to 100pp an hour in Rathe
grouped and doing alpha loot... The most I've looted off a HG at one time is
41pp, the least is a few gold. Usually it's pp somewhere in between.
Everyone I know at all levels above 30 go to Rathe specifically for cash...
Xp is good if you are a lower level (I have a 29 Troll SK)but cash is the
best I've seen so far. Speaking of Unrest, my guild (Fire and Brimstone,
Ayonae Ro) is doing a raid on Unrest this Saturday, should be fun I need to
replace the Bloodstained Mantle I lost in a bad trade awhile back... They
are doing a raid on Mistmoore tonight, but I can't loose faction with the
Indigo Brotherhood since I do all my business in Neriak....
Anyway, my 2cp on makin money... I checked out the guides too, I'll keep
doin what I've been doin....

Steven Hulse wrote:


Thank you for posting this. I went to check them out and you know I have to
say I was a little dissapointed in the guides. A lot of the information that
they contain can be found at almost any EQ related website! It's basically
that I'm glad I didn't pay for any of these guides, it's really not worth
the money. The only thing I'm truly interested in is making money. Man it
sucks trying to get some decent armor when you have no money. I've wondered
about the "make Plat at any level" guides and I figured that you would still
need to group or partner at some point.

Either way I'm having fun just going along and doing things the old
fashioned way. I do suggest going and getting these guides because there
were a few things in there that was nice to know about but for any player,
especially noobs, I suggest doing it the old fashioned way and go out there
and take the lumps and partner with some others. It's funner and you'll feel
better knowing that you did it on your own.

I got some good info about Unrest so I think I may go and try it out this
week.

--
